folder: Buffalo Avenue & St. Mark's Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Buffalo Avenue - St. Mark's Avenue
text:
Buffalo Ave., east side, north of St. Mark's Ave. At the left, is No. 151. Also shown is the trolley tracks of the Buffalo Ave., Line.

May 8, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
